name: Verlaine
address: 110 Rivington St, New York, NY 10002, USA

reviews.text: Best Lychee Martinis in town and live Salsa on Sundays! üç∏üçæüï∫üèª‚Ä¶
Went here for their happy hour, which was from 5pm-10pm with lychee martinis and sangrias. They have a variety of finger foods with vegan and vegetarian options as well.
went for after dinner cocktails, got the lychee martinis happy hour $8 and they‚Äôre so good!! We sat by the bar and Oscar was an amazing bartender. Would gladly go back!!
Best bar I swear! Everyone so friendly, comfortable atmosphere and amazing lychee martini!
Enjoyed the fried chicken dumplings and yummy lychee martinis. Get there early because it gets packed.
Lychee martini and wings are my go-to! Amazing taste and vibe here

Happy hour here , will have you leaving super happy. Those lychee martinis are truly something to drink for! The food was so flavorful and filling , definitely recommend the ‚ÄúVerlaine LoMein‚Äù and ‚ÄúSweet n‚Äô Spiced wings‚Äù. The waiters were very friendly as well as the bar staff , truly a must visit .

Spectacular! All

Very tasty! And there was a live orchestra! It was unforgettable! I arrived on a Sunday for the

Night! I loved the atmosphere!

Favorite place for salsa and lychee martinis in the city! Come here often with friends to dance, and catch up, though it gets loud during salsa nights.

I haven‚Äôt had their food, just the martinis and sangrias. The vibe is immaculate, the lighting is cozy and inviting, they have a set of great photographs on the wall and the bartenders work really hard to keep everyone satisfied even if it does take you a couple of minutes until they get to you.
Lychee martini happy hour is insane! Amazing vibe, nice city place to grab a cocktail.
Great atmosphere!
Drinks have no alcohol in them. Don‚Äôt waste your money

ountability for his mistake and throwing the new check on the table with the bills obviously wrinkled and angrily put back in. We were paying for the second bill that the waiter presented us when the waiter AGAIN accosted us saying we paid for the wrong bill even though it‚Äôs his responsibility to give us the correct bill. Yelling at customers for your own mistake TWICE is unacceptable. We then gave him a card to put the rest of the balance on and asked him to admit to his mistake because he yelled at us for not paying our bill, which he proceeded to not do and instead continue to yell at. We asked for a manager and were needed with a chuckle from another employee who then went to the server to laugh at us. This was highly inappropriate and we would recommend anyone who is served by a male server in his late thirties to early fourties‚Äô wearing a scarf around his hair, to immediately ask for another server so you are not treated in the same disrespectful manner that we were. Apparently, here we as customers, we are supposed to keep track of how much our drinks cost and keep a running tab so we do not get verbally assaulted.
Saeed got us a table for 5 quickly on a busy night and Shahyed took great care of us. Insane prices for NYC and the food was incredible in addition to the happy hour drinks. We‚Äôll be back!
Rude servers - had a great time until they got upset with me for being overcharged. Nasty energy.
Great Lychee Martinis!
Home of the signature lychee martini, great price during happy hour. Also had the R&R, also very delightful and refreshing with the muddled cucumber.

Drinks were mid, auto 20% gratuity. Super loud so I could barely order and had to push in between people to get to the bartender. Drinks kept spilling, people kept bumping. Not a great vibe.

To the owner: was there May 31st
love me a lychee martini

Let me start by saying the lychee martini is the reason why I wanted to go here and it did not disappoint. It was a very popular happy hour drink and I understand why. We tried some apps which were also good so there is nothing to complain about when it comes to the food, drinks, and service.

The atmosphere was the issue for me. This place packs in everyone so close together you can't even have a conversation with the person you came with without yelling. All the tables are along a wall going all the way back
I had the unfortunate privilege of sitting in a seat that was constantly kicked because there were so many people at the bar area, there wasn't enough space for anyone to walk through without tripping over the leg of my chair. They should really limit the amount of people they let in because there was no clear path for anyone to walk through and the restroom and kitchen were both in the back so two hours of kicked chair was quite unpleasant.

If you dont mind it being really loud and you sit against the wall instead of in the aisle like I did you may have a better experience.
Lychee Martinis are a HIT. Had the gyozas they were so delicious ü•ü . Does get packed tho. Can be a little overwhelming but the happy hour menu is a bangerrr lol

THEY ADD 20 % GRATUITY AUTOMATICALLY!. This is even for the bar that is over crowded and we had to wait a long time just to be taken note of.. another way restaurants have started to fleece off customers but pay a living wage to folks working there. Not sure if this goes to the servers as they propose a tip% in the check as well. I see in the reviews that the 20% was added due to covid, so the owner just conveniently forgot to remove it post covid. As for the drinks,  the lychee martini was great and was made about right and a good deal for happy hours. Food was ok, Loud environment, and service was mediocre, never to justify the added gratuity.

Drinks were good, cute place. However the waitress was rude. Yesterday, I‚Äôm in line at 5PM with my homegirls, the line gets longer and longer behind us. She unlocks the door, gets the sign ready but leaves us out there for ten minutes instead of opening the door and welcoming us in. Why wouldn‚Äôt she open the door and let us know the place is ready? 0/10 customer service skills.

Don‚Äôt add a 20% service charge on a two person tab for literally no reason and without letting the customers know. We ordered two drinks bro and not food like chill out dude you‚Äôre not that great and there‚Äôs plenty better elsewhere
The whole place is a vibe, good service.

Went for happy hour with some friends and it was a cute place with mood lighting and nice decor. There were select drinks discounted for HH, no food but we enjoyed and went nearby for a bite after. Lychee martini‚Äôs were good but tasted more like pineapple than lychee. When we asked for a round of waters instead of another round of drinks our server closed us out which felt a bit rushed but we just took it as a sign to move to next place
Verlaines is Amazing!!!! Best Lychee Martinis in NYC

Great lychee martinis...and only $8!! These seemed to be the drink of choice for most in the bar. Attentive bartenders.   Too bad the Goddess isn't with me here in NYC, a good lychee martini is her favorite!
It ain‚Äôt it
Love love, love this place.Great.Live music, great DJ music.The drinks are amazing amazing atmosphere
The salsa band on Sundays is the best!!!
The best lychee martinis for $10 happy hour every day of the week until 10 pm.
I mean yeah, they lychee martinis are great.

If you‚Äôre searching for a spot in Manhattan that serves a standout lychee martini, Verlaine in the Lower East Side is a must-visit.

The lychee martini at Verlaine is a delightful blend offering a balance of sweetness and subtle tartness. It‚Äôs no surprise that they serve approximately 2,500 of these cocktails each week, making it their most popular drink .Ôøº

Beyond the drinks, Verlaine offers a cozy ambiance with minimalist d√©cor, making it an ideal spot for both casual evenings and special occasions. Their menu features a variety of Southeast Asian tapas, such as five-spice calamari with Vietnamese honey dipping sauce and chicken satay with coconut peanut sauce, which pair perfectly with their cocktails .Ôøº

In summary, Verlaine offers a unique blend of flavorful cocktails, delectable small plates, and a vibrant atmosphere, making it a standout destination in Manhattan‚Äôs bar scene.
We went to this place for a post-work happy hour. Ended up staying till 10. Delicious food. Best deal on the drinks.
Great business model with the lychee signature drinks - great service
Great spot for cheap drinks but don‚Äôt get their food üòÇ
Lychee martinis and dumplings are fire!
Best lychee martinis in the lower east side!!!

Beautiful people Salsa üíÉ Sunday was awesome the drinks were amazing

Recommend!

Great place to grab a drink. They have happy hour every day with 8 dollar cocktails. Very worth.

The service is great. And the food is pretty decent. We got chicken wings and they were pretty good. It wasn't the best but it wasn't bad.

Great atmosphere especially for a date.
Love this spot for the Asian/latin fusion vibe, cheap lychee martinis and delicious pickings

Only 2 words for this place - LYCHEE MARTINI
They have the best lychee martini and their happy hour is till 10pm!!
This place gets VERY crowded on weekends after 8pm and it‚Äôs impossible to find a place to even stand, but if you can make it before that..it‚Äôs worth it.

Only problem I have with this place is that one of the servers is a bit rude and seems to always be ignoring when you are trying to call him to give your order.
Nice service, good food and drinks, and great ambience.

They still have one of the best Lychee martinis in town! restaurant is clean, service is pretty good, friendly and efficient, food is average and reasonably priced. Gratuity is already included in the bill so no need to tip extra unless it's exceptional service
Good drinks, a bit pricy
Went for the salsa dancing on a Sunday and we had a great time. Definitely going back!

- drinks were good, vibes were good, food was mid, service was bad. the waiter had so much attitude and rolled his eyes when i said we weren‚Äôt ready to order yet. what‚Äôs worse is they automatically added a 20% gratuity
- chicken satay: dry chicken and the sauce was off.  the rice had coconut flakes in it.
- decorations were really pretty though and the ambiance is nice
Had a great night at this place, we came to salsa sunday and the atmosphere is amazing, service was excellent and music was hitting! We enjoyed everything specially the vibesüôåüèªüíÉüèª

I‚Äôve been going to Verlaine in the Lower East Side for years, and it‚Äôs always been a great experience. The vibe is consistently cool, with dim lighting, vibrant photos, and good music that set the perfect mood whether you‚Äôre there for a dinner date or after-work drinks with friends. I‚Äôve even caught a live salsa band here, which was incredible, and celebrated a New Year‚Äôs Eve that was unforgettable! The bartenders have always been chill and welcoming, especially Xavier. On my most recent visit, I enjoyed some light bites like the fried chicken dumplings and sake shrimp skewers, both were delicious! And, of course, my partner‚Äôs favorite, the Lychee Martinis, never disappoint. Just a heads up, on weekends, it can get full, so plan to arrive a little early for the best experience. Highly recommend Verlaine as part of a fun night out in the area!

This place is truly a vibe! The service is great . Everyone is super friendly and helpful. Leech martini is so delicious and the food is very flavorful. My favorite from the menu would be the short rib sliders. I also love the shrimp skewers!

I came in on Saturday Aug 21st for the first time and man this place is sexy! üòÉ The Lychee was amazing!!! Lawrd! Staff were awesome especially the bartenders. This is a veryyy cool spot if you‚Äôre on a date! I loved it and I highly recommend it!

Absolutely obsessed with their lychee martinis. Happy hour goes until 10 pm and you can‚Äôt get a better deal. Vibes are great, with nice mood lighting and music that‚Äôs not too loud and overpowering. Perfect place for a pregame or date night.
Got introduced to this spot. Gets busy quick so get there before 6! The lychee martinis are great and so are the wings. Good ambience and lowlight vibes. Would eat here again.

Didn‚Äôt have any food as this place was the 1st stop, but definitely had three of their Lychee Martinis. Excellent stop for a simple and consistent cocktail, you can‚Äôt beat $8. You might have more than two ‚Ä¶ and that‚Äôs okay. You came there for a reason! The music was great, I shamelessly Shazam‚Äôd a bit. I think if you want a chill spot to chat and relax, this place is it.

Verlaine is a charming Thai restaurant that offers good food, chic decor, cozy ambience, and one of the best happy hour deals in the city. Every Tuesday to Sunday from 5 to 10 PM, they offer their happy hour deal, which includes lychee martinis, ros√© sangrias, and red sangrias for $8. Their food is tasty and affordable, and the atmosphere is lively but not loud, making it a great spot for catching up or getting to know someone.

Definitely one of the best bars I‚Äôve been to in LES. Their Happy Hour is a deal, with $8 Lychee Martinis. Service was very friendly and attentive. Atmosphere was very relaxed and a nice vibe to start the evening. Will definitely be coming back.

$8 lychee martinis until 10pm is such a vibe. there was no wait on a wednesday night. it was loud when we first got there around 9 and a bit hard to hear across the table, but by like 9:30 it was a good level of noise

Merhaba ;

Bartender guy with the beard was so rude for no reason!!! My boyfriend wasn‚Äôt even having happy hour & the bartender never even acknowledged us. 20% gratuity added despite us never getting service, constantly had to raise our hand for another drink and bartender got mad that we did. We sat on a table first then moved to the bar. The only helpful one was the anime shirt one, he was nice and helpful, he should be bartender or server. Bad service from the servers and that one bartender!!! I do not agree with the 20% tip automatically added!!!!!!

Lychee Martini 5/5 -- $8 during happy hour on a Friday!

Calamari 4.5/5
Fries 4/5

There was definitely a wait on a Friday night without a reservation for a table, so we had to stand around the bar area for our first round. When we got seated, our apps came out very quick!

Fun, popular, friendly place that specializes in Lychee Martinis. I've lived in Southeast Asia and tried many lychee martinis there. These are the best ever! And, they are at happy hour prices until 10 p.m.!  (But don't tell too many people because they get super crowded already!)

We came here for dinner and drinks on a sunday night and didn't know it was like a salsa dancing night? with $8 lychee martini deals? The place started filling up around us around 8, and the band started playing and people started dancing! The lychee martinis were great but the food was okay. The chicken satay skewers could've been moister and the lo mein was good enough. The ambiance is cozy and cute - maybe too cozy because the tables are packed incredibly close together. In summary, the food was okay but the vibes and drinks were great.

One of my favorite restaurants to go to when I‚Äôm in NYC! Love their menu the food is always fresh, served extremely quick and the $8 yummy lychee martini‚Äôs are delicious! Can‚Äôt go wrong with this place definitely will be coming back whenever I can üòÅ

Reasonably priced happy hour drinks were available. The desert we had with caramel bourbon sauce was exceptional. Each happy hour drink came with a lychee berry inside the glass. The ambiance was warm and inviting. The staff was friendly and prompt. It‚Äôs great for all sizes of groups. Hope this helps!

Ambiance is so on chill you become comfortable as soon as you sit down. I heard that sometimes there can be a wait to get in but luckily on this day there was no wait.

The appetizers/small plates were not only enough for 6 people to order varieties and share, but they were DELICIOUS!

As far a drinks, Lychee martini me please!!! So good! Those martinis will definitely do the trick so throw them back slowly.

Tacos were good but an interesting Asian fusion, fries were good. It was definitely loud in there, more so go there for drinks don‚Äôt expect to have a calm dinner there. Service was decent. Pricing ok.

$8 lychee martinis and sangrias until 10 pm - that‚Äôs a happy hour I can get behind! I‚Äôve been here three times but this past Tuesday was the first time I‚Äôve actually eaten at Verlaine.

My two friends and I shared one order of each of these: ginger chicken wings (so crispy, very good, we said we‚Äôd come back and get multiple orders of them next time), coconut curry with veggies (pretty good), veggie dumplings (you can probably skip), and chicken tacos (nothing special).

Vibes still great and definitely packed. We arrived at 7 pm without a reservation and were immediately seated - but it filled up quickly after!

One of my fave spots to enjoy a good happy hour and small bites. The ambiance alone is a nice vibe. Can‚Äôt really hear the music because people are connecting but that‚Äôs okay. Nice spot to enjoy a good convo with friends.

Hip bar with an asian vibe in the Lower East Side.

The Good:
- cool vibe
- nice staff
- drinks ok

The not so good:
- Food was not good
- Wings were dried out, appeared to be frozen food that was heated inadequately
- the noodles was also not very hot

Overall: an subpar experience, if you're there, only drink and eat elsewhere.

Absolutely loved this spot. We went during happy hour which is from 5-10pm. We had the lychee martini‚Äôs which were $8 and were strong but delicious. We also ordered the deep fried chicken dumplings and the sweet & spiced wings which was great as well. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a happy hour spot.

A great pregame spot and good for large groups or small get togethers!! They‚Äôre known for their $8 HH lychee martinis even on the weekend until 8pm? It‚Äôs very easy to have 3-5!!

The apps are alright. The fries were good to share and the wings were crispy and well sauced.

$8 lychee martinis until 10pm? Sign me up! Good music, good crowd, great service. Don't expect to be able to sit if you are just going for walk-in drinks, but you will still have a great time while standing!

would go back for the happy hour deal - 8$ lychee martinis or red/ rose sangria until 10pm. not bad! lovely atmosphere, only ding is music is so loud you have to yell at the person right next to you lol. music was good tho!

Overall rating: 4.5

I am so happy to know this place is still in business. Definitely a 20s place for sure. It was weird revisiting in my 30s.

Happy hour still stands until 10pm. Inflation increased the price, but still a good deal. I probably won‚Äôt come again because I‚Äôve outgrown it. But I recommend if you‚Äôre under 30! Totalllly your spot.
Believe the hype - the lychee martinis are amazing! Menu is a lot better than most ‚Äúbar food‚Äù options. Short rib sliders were great and filling.
Nice place for drinks. Tried lychee martini and tacos. Great drink but the tacos were tiny but tasty. The place was packed and loud.

Verlaine is my FAVORITE bar in NYC. I've been coming here for 10 years. We love to visit here for the late happy hour. The food is also very good. LOVE this place.  P.s. grab a crepe around the corner after you're done at verlaine:p

If you have a reservation there is no wait. We had a reservation for 9 and just walked in and got sat right away. Be wary of people who are standing behind you waiting for a table cus they will be entitled and rude. A friend of mine kept‚Ä¶
